item.title: Scrrrenshots
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Sometimes screenshots need t' be redone. This plank explains how t' create th' different screenshots, tools an' sett'ns Common Use English translat'n Empty search Remove history checkmarks but leave it on th' plank thats used fer th' screenshot Screenshot Rrrambl'n: A meaningful full-screen screenshot o' an interest'n plank.
